Then a question arises as to how the northeastward wave route can be formed even if a critical latitude (i.e., zonal wind is zero)

35 . A complete Rossby wave theory that considers the inclusion of the meridional basic wind in the derivation of meridional group velocity leads to wave energy escaping from the easterly wind region.
